content: {"locationId": "1202", "organizationId": "1052", "name": "Empower Boone Food Pantry", "address1": "200 South 5th Street", "address2": "", "city": "Capron", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61012", "country": null, "phone": "815-569-1571", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "42.3981", "longitude": "-88.74226", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Mobile Market", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Food curbside distribution to all of Boone County residents every Tuesday 8am-200pm while supplies last.  Free clothing and housewares closet open to all counties in need.  On-site free pet food pantry open to all counties.  WARMING CENTER/COOLING CENTER open to all during office hours Mon, Tue, Thur 9am-3pm.  Warm up during cold weather with a warm cup of coffee/hot chocolate in a safe place.  Cool off during extreme heat with cold water and a safe resting place.", "notes": "HOLIDAY HOURS SCHEDULE:  MONDAY MAY 26, 2025 - CLOSED FOR MEMORIAL HOLIDAY  MONDAY SEPT 1, 2025 - CLOSED FOR LABOR DAY HOLIDAY  TUESDAY NOV 11, 2025 - CLOSED FOR VETERAN'S DAY HOLIDAY  THURSDAY NOVEMBER 27, 2025 - CLOSED FOR THANKSGIVING HOLIDAY   THURSDAY DEC 25, 2025 - CLOSED FOR CHRISTMAS DAY  THURSDAY JAN 1, 2026 - CLOSED FOR NEW YEARS DAY       ", "contactName": "Brenda Valadez", "contactPhone": "815-569-1571", "contactEmail": "office@empowerboone.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Grocery / Client Choice, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Other, Pet Food / Supplies, Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
